pages.text: Teleporting mirrors have a great bonus of allowing players to teleport home, or save a teleport location in the nether or the end.

pages.title: Mirrors
pages.text: The mirror allows the player to return from anywhere to their bed or a specified point.
The standard mirror works in the Overworld. When the player stands still and holds right-click, they will return to their bed.

pages.title: Mirror Recipe
pages.string: Hold still, hold right-click, go home.

pages.text: The Nether mirror works only in the Nether. The player must first right-click on a block to establish a return point. The mirror will light up. When the player is ready to return, stand still and holds right-click, they will come back to their return point.

The end mirror works in the End. The player must first right-click on a block to establish a return point. The mirror will light up. When the player is ready to return, the player stands still and holds right-click to return to their established point.

pages.title: End Mirror Recipe
pages.string: Hold still, hold right-click, go home.
